title: << June 2014 >>
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4119=June 16, 2015, 2495=The SH Executive Committee is calling for proposals for topics for the 2017 SH / EAHP Workshop.  This workshop will be held in conjunction with the 2017 ASCP Annual Meeting on September 21-23, 2017 at the Chicago Hyatt Regency.  If you are interested in organizing a workshop, please submit your proposal to This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. , by September 15, 2015.  A new, simplified proposal form is available here.  Proposals will be reviewed by the SH Leadership and the organizers for the next workshop identified by early November to allow for sufficient time for program planning and development.  We look forward to receiving your workshop proposals. , 4028=Winter/Spring 2015, 3994=It was wonderful seeing all of the Society for Hematopathology members at the 2015 USCAP Meeting in Boston, Massachusetts in March.  Below are some of the highlights from the many activities of Society for Hematopathology over the past six months:, 826=Oct. 29 – Oct. 31, 2015 Long Beach, CA, USA Workshop Topic: Immunodeficiency and Dysregulation The objectives of this workshop are to improve understanding of primary and secondary immunodeficiencies and disorders of immune dysregulation and refine diagnostic criteria surrounding immunodeficiency-related hematopoietic malignancy and their separation from immune-mediated morphologic mimics. }
textBeforeTable: Calendar Read more details here... Oct. 29 – Oct. 31, 2015 Long Beach, CA, USA Workshop Topic: Immunodeficiency and Dysregulation The objectives of this workshop are to improve understanding of primary and secondary immunodeficiencies and disorders of immune dysregulation and refine diagnostic criteria surrounding immunodeficiency-related hematopoietic malignancy and their separation from immune-mediated morphologic mimics.  2015 SH-EAHP Workshop   , by September 15, 2015.  A new, simplified proposal form is available here.  Proposals will be reviewed by the SH Leadership and the organizers for the next workshop identified by early November to allow for sufficient time for program planning and development.  We look forward to receiving your workshop proposals.  //--> document.getElementById('cloak97683').innerHTML += ''+addy_text97683+'<\/a>'; var addy_text97683 = 'sherrie.perkins' + '@' + 'hsc' + '.' + 'utah' + '.' + 'edu'; addy97683 = addy97683 + 'hsc' + '.' + 'utah' + '.' + 'edu'; var addy97683 = 'sherrie.perkins' + '@'; var path = 'hr' + 'ef' + '='; var prefix = 'ma' + 'il' + 'to'; document.getElementById('cloak97683').innerHTML = ''; //
